snippet: Inspections have found that the Soyuz rockets do not have the flaw that caused an unmanned cargo ship to crash in August, Russia’s space chief said Friday.
lead_paragraph: Inspections have found that the Soyuz rockets do not have the flaw that caused an unmanned cargo ship to crash in August, Russia’s space chief said Friday.

headline.main: Russia: Agency Finds Soyuz Fleet Clear of Fatal Defect
headline.print_headline: Russia: Agency Finds Soyuz Fleet Clear of Fatal Defect
